items.name: Power Stone
items.description: Now what could a stone like this be used for?

items.name: Temporary Black Dragon Taming Buff
items.description: Consume this item to give you 10 minutes of an aura that greatly reduces black dragon aggro range and increases their food drain. By defeating one of the black dragons enemies you have temporarily gained their respect.

items.name: Bogwyrm Sludge
items.description: A strange slime created by the bogwyrm, for some reason, achatina are willing to eat this...

items.name: Dragons Broth
items.description: Item

items.name: Jabberwock Repellant
items.description: Prevents the jabberwock from temporarily targetting you

items.name: Narcotic
items.description: Increases your health, but puts you to sleep.

items.name: Shelob Venom
items.description: Do not consume without caution! Raises torpor rapidly and drains hunger, but also causes health to rapidly decline and inflicts the consumer with venom debuff. Mass consumption will extend the duration of draining, use this to speed up taming with caution!

items.name: Greater Healing Potion
items.description: Regenerates base 15 hp per second for 30 seconds. Cannot be mass applied as the duration of the healing buff does not reset if you use another while healing is still active.

items.name: Stamina Potion
items.description: Item dropped from some apex's, restores stamina rapidly for 100 seconds. Is useful for creatures that have stamina problems such as gigas and rock golems.

items.name: Stimulant
items.description: Keeps you awake, but dehydrates you.

items.name: Raw Salted Fish Meat
items.description: Eating raw food will SLIGHTLY sate hunger, but is unhealthy for humans.  Most wild carnivores prefer raw meat to cooked meat.

items.name: Raw Sweetened Fish Meat
items.description: Eating raw food will SLIGHTLY sate hunger, but is unhealthy for humans.  Most wild carnivores prefer raw meat to cooked meat.

items.name: Black Pearl
items.description: A rare resource from the bottom of the sea...

items.name: Bronze Wyvern Scale
items.description: A precious metallic scale acquired from a bronze wyvern, these scales are extremely hard and could be a replacement for metal in certain crafting requirements.

items.name: Element Thread
items.description: A thread made from element...

items.name: Geobreaker Hallucinagen Glands
items.description: A special organ that the geobreaker dragon possesses, the source of its hallucinogenic fluids. Inside these glands are some hallucinogenic liquid, perhaps with careful extraction they could be utilized as a coating on arrowheads?

items.name: Immortal Dragon Spike
items.description: A sharp spike that was originally a part of an elder dragon. With its durability and sharpness, it might be useful to use it for weapons. Or perhaps it can be grinded up into powder for potions?

items.name: Immortal Dragon Powder
items.description: Created by grinding an elder dragons spike. Can be used for medicinal purposes

items.name: Kirin Horn
items.description: Even when removed from its owner, this horn crackles with energy...

items.name: Scaulding Salt
items.description: Can be used as a substitute for preserving salt.

items.name: Pangolin Spine
items.description: A sharp scale that the pangolin wyvern sheds and fires as a deadly projectile.

items.name: Silica Pearls
items.description: These pearls are made almost entirely of Silicon.  Can be refined into Silicon plates.

items.name: Dragons Evolved Boss: Frost Golem Spawner
items.description:
Spawns the Frost Golem Boss, in case it doesnt spawn naturally in your world. WARNING, WILD BOSS, IM NOT RESPONSIBLE IF YOU DESTROY YOUR OWN BASE BY ACCIDENTLY SPAWNING THIS THING THERE.

NOTE: Dont be a pile of crap and spawn this thing in someone elses base....

items.name: Dragons Evolved Boss: Molten Golem Spawner
items.description:
Spawns the Molten Golem Boss, in case it doesnt spawn naturally in your world. WARNING, WILD BOSS, IM NOT RESPONSIBLE IF YOU DESTROY YOUR OWN BASE BY ACCIDENTLY SPAWNING THIS THING THERE.

NOTE: Dont be a pile of crap and spawn this thing in someone elses base....

NOTE: Dont be a pile of crap and spawn this thing in someone elses base....

items.name: Dragons Evolved Boss: Sentinel Aquarius Spawner
items.description: Spawns the Aquarius Boss, in case it doesnt spawn naturally in your world. WARNING, WILD BOSS, MUST BE SPAWNED DEEP UNDERWATER. It also spawns like 500 feet in front of you so dont look at the land while spawning.

items.name: Dragons Evolved Boss: Sentinel Malus Spawner
items.description:
Spawns the Malus Boss, in case it doesnt spawn naturally in your world. WARNING, WILD BOSS, IM NOT RESPONSIBLE IF YOU DESTROY YOUR OWN BASE BY ACCIDENTLY SPAWNING THIS THING THERE.

NOTE: Dont be a pile of crap and spawn this thing in someone elses base....

items.description:

NOTE: Dont be a pile of crap and spawn this thing in someone elses base....

items.name: Arch Tempered Spawner
items.description: spawns a carno that summons a random arch tempered boss

items.name: Dragons Evolved Boss: Stone Golem Spawner
items.description:
Spawns the Stone Golem Boss, in case it doesnt spawn naturally in your world. WARNING, WILD BOSS, IM NOT RESPONSIBLE IF YOU DESTROY YOUR OWN BASE BY ACCIDENTLY SPAWNING THIS THING THERE.

NOTE: Dont be a pile of crap and spawn this thing in someone elses base....

items.name: Hallucinogenic Arrow
items.description: Less deadly than other arrows, but inflicts the geobreakers low tier hallucinogenic status effect onto targets. Has a much higher chance to break on impact than normal arrows (50% rather than 10%)

items.name: Hallucinogenic Ball
items.description: A hallucinogenic ball, while it wont have any effect due to being unable to enter a targets bloodstream. The smell might be enough to calm down a weakened geobreaker... possibly even allowing you to passive tame one!

items.name: Mudball
items.description: Maybe a certain dragon will find a mudfight interesting.

items.name: Dragon Spike Spear
items.description: A spear crafted with its tip being made from the spike of an elder dragon.

items.name: Dragonoid Mecha
items.description: Summons atal-arkas mek

items.name: Giant Mecha
items.description: Summons atal-arkas mek

items.name: Summon Tameable Gammoth
items.description: Summons a tamed version of the Arch-Tempered Gammoth. As of latest update. This creature is still WIP. Has no AI and cannot be ridden.

items.name: Summon Dododragon
items.description: Summons the dododragon, WARNING, DOES NOT SPAWN IN TAMED, YOU MUST TAME IT YOURSELF!!!!!!!

items.description: Tremendously nourishing by itself, this egg provides regular nutritional value in many cooking recipes.

items.name: Summon Creature
items.description: Summons a Creature!

items.name: Box o' Chocolates
items.description: <RichColor Color="1, 0.5, 0.8, 1">This chocolate's delicious, despite its origins. The Island's creatures LOVE it, as it fully heals them or advances their taming!</>

items.name: Valentines Dino Candy
items.description: Has a curious effect when consumed by a dinosaur.

items.name: Bunny Egg
items.description: Put it in a Cooking Pot to craft fun costumes or place on the ground as a festive decoration!

items.name: Stolen Headstone
items.description: A headstone stolen from a graveyard.

items.name: Pumpkin
items.description: Decorate your base with this pumpkin. Can be "carved" with all manner of paints.

items.name: Scarecrow
items.description: Decorate your base with this scarecrow.  Guaranteed to scare the crows away.

items.name: Dinosaur Bone
items.description: A very ancient looking bone, must be usefull for something!

items.description: Eat it to gain tremendous nourishment, or use it in recipies, or...

items.name: Raw Meat Preserving
items.description: Eating raw food will sate hunger, but is unhealthy for humans.  Most wild carnivores prefer raw meat to cooked meat. Preserving x10
